responses: Hey! o/ What can I help you with?
Hello, and thanks for visiting me! How may I be of assistance?
Hi! What can I do for you?
Hi, there! How can I help?
See you later! Thanks for visiting!
Have a nice day!
Good-bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
It's been my pleasure!

Take a look at the list of videos on our Videos page. You can watch the Developing Creator's progression in learning how to create Angular SPAs, and even content he streams on his gaming channel, directly on this website!
We have videos on Angular SPA creation demonstrations and Minecraft gameplay content. Check out the Videos link towards the top of the webpage!

patterns: Who is The White Ninja MC?
responses: This website was created by The White Ninja MC (a.k.a., Aaron Bechtel). He is a passionate developer who believes in creating innovative, engaging, and user-friendly content for his clients and viewers. He strives to create accessible website content that showcases his talents as a Minecraft content-creator on YouTube and a professional developer in Web Design and Development.

patterns: Do you have a contact form?
I want to reach out to you.
How do I keep in touch with you?
I need to contact the administrator.
Is there a way to contact you?
responses:
You can reach out to us on the Contact page for any issues, or on social media platforms like Twitter (@aaron_bechtel) and YouTube (@thewhiteninjamc) if that doesn't work for you. We're always looking for new ways to engage with our audience and create new content!

Thank you for your interest in our website!

patterns: How do you use my data?
I want to understand your privacy policy.
responses:
We collect user information such as your name, email address, and any other personal information you provide to us. This information is used to provide you with the best possible experience on our website, to respond to your inquiries, and to improve our services. We do not sell or share this information with third parties.

For more information on our privacy policy, please visit our Privacy Policy page.

patterns: I want to make a donation.
responses:
We're glad you're considering donating to the developers of this website! We're a small, dedicated team of developers who are dedicated to creating high-quality, engaging content for our audience. As a result, we don't currently have the resources to accept your donations personally. However, we encourage you to share your support on social media platforms, where others can see your expereince and help us reach out to a greater audience. We're always looking for new ways to engage with our audience and create new content!

Again, thank you greatly for your support!

patterns: Can you give me some motivation?
I want to make my own content.
I want to create my own content.
responses:
I'm always inspired by the incredible creators and viewers who come to our website. I believe in creating content that is accessible, engaging, and inspiring for everyone.

I also try to inspire my audience by asking them questions, sharing my own experiences, and offering some dad-jokes to help them relax and unwind. I hope you enjoy my content and find my ideas helpful in your own projects!

patterns: I want to learn more about Angular!
I want to build my own Angular SPA.
responses: Angular is a JavaScript framework for building single-page applications. It is widely used for creating applications with a user-friendly interface and a clean, maintainable codebase. To learn more about Angular and The White Ninja MC's headaches and achievements, visit our Videos page!

patterns: I want to learn more about the Minecraft content!
What kind of Minecraft videos can you share?
responses: We have a variety of Minecraft content on YouTube, including tutorials, gameplay, and content creations. To find out more, check out our Videos page!

patterns: I want to hear something funny.
responses: Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Good dad-jokes are hard to come by. That's why mine never comes with milk.

patterns: How do I use this system?
What do I need to do?
I don't know how to use this system.
I don't know how this works.
responses:
I'm happy to help!
I'm a kind chatbot that can describe our videos and give some dad-jokes.
To start, just ask me anything in the input box, and I will give you the best information I know accordingly.

Fair warning: Some responses may be hallucinations, as I don't always function well.

If you get this message, you will know I am healthy.

Thanks for asking, though! I appreciate your concern.
